query: select to_regclass('public.record_files') as record_files, EXISTS (select 1 from information_schema.columns where table_schema='public' and table_name='production_orders' and column_name='image_url') as production_orders_image_url, EXISTS (select 1 from information_schema.columns where table_schema='public' and table_name='production_boms' and column_name='image_url') as production_boms_image_url
